page.title: 11A 1980'S HOUSE
page.content: THE OUTSIDE Houses are made of brick which are stuck together with cement. There are glass windows and a wooden door. Some houses are attached others detached. THE GARDEN Most gardens have grassy lawns with some flowers. There might be a shed ( a small wooden hut for keeping working tools in) or a garage (a building to keep a car in). THE INSIDE Most houses are one or two storeys high; each storey has about four to six rooms. On the top floor are the bedrooms, toilets and bathrooms. On the lower floor is a kitchen, dining room and living room/lounge.
